decisions.description: Decision which checks if it was a quarantine awaiting inspection and inspection logged OR quarantine awaiting calibration and calibration logged move in to available status. Otherwise keeps original status.
decisions.name: Check_if_Mismatch_been_Inspection_Type
decisions.label: Check if Mismatch been Inspection Type

decisions.description: Checks if the inspection record type was quarantine or calibration, ensures a product transfer is genereated for these and not standard inventory checks.
decisions.name: Check_if_Product_Transfer_is_Required
decisions.label: Check if Product Transfer is Required

decisions.description: Checks what the result of each inspection outcome
decisions.name: Decide_New_Item_Status1
decisions.label: Decide New Item Status

decisions.description: Checks what type of inventory check was completed.
decisions.name: Inventory_Check_Type
decisions.label: Inventory Check Type

decisions.description: Splits the path based on inventory check serialised product updates.
decisions.name: Inventory_Serialised_Product_Update
decisions.label: Inventory Serialised Product Update

decisions.description: Checks to see if the item already needed a calibration, if so no Product Transfer is required.
decisions.name: Item_Already_Requiring_Calibration
decisions.label: Item Already Requiring Calibration?

decisions.description: Checks if the inspection was a pass or fail to ensure location is moved if required on the Serialised Product.
decisions.name: Pass_Fail
decisions.label: Pass/Fail

decisions.description: Checks if the inspection item was a pass or fail, and whether it should have a product transfer as it's awaiting repair or calibration. Anything listed as unserviceable or lost/stolen should have already had a transfer to EOL.
decisions.name: Pass_Fail_Inspection_Item
decisions.label: Pass/Fail Inspection Item?

formulas.description: Returns the full name of the running user record.
formulas.name: Full_Running_User_Name_Return

loops.description: Loops through the created Product Transfers in order to update the records.
loops.name: Loop_to_Update_Product_Transfers

recordUpdates.name: Product
